resume.title: Resume
resume.about-text: Trainee software developer (application development) in Germany with an economic background. I was born in Ukraine and have been living in Germany since 2022. After finishing school, I completed vocational training and later obtained a university degree in economics. My academic education includes a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration and a Specialist diploma in Finance. Both degrees are officially recognized in Germany. After several years of professional experience as an economist and later as a self-employed content manager and online marketing specialist, I decided to change my career path towards IT and software development.

legal.title: Legal Notice (Impressum)
legal.text1: Responsible for content according to Section 18 (2) of the Interstate Media Treaty (MStV):
legal.text2:
The content of this website has been created with the utmost care. However, no guarantee is given for the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the information provided.

Liability for Links
This website contains links to external third-party websites. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is solely responsible for their content.

Copyright
The content and materials created by the site operator are subject to German copyright law. Any use beyond the limits of copyright law requires the prior written consent of the author.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.text:
This website is used exclusively for professional self-presentation and is not indexed.

1. Controller
The controller responsible for data processing on this website is:
privacy.text1:
2. Hosting
This website is hosted via GitHub, Inc., 88 Colin P. Kelly Jr. Street, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA.
When accessing the website, server log files are automatically collected (IP address, date and time of access, browser type, operating system).
Processing is carried out under Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in a secure and stable website).
Data may be transferred to the USA under appropriate safeguards (Art. 44 ff. GDPR).
Further information can be found in GitHub's privacy policy.

3. Contact Form
A contact form provided by Formspree Inc., USA, is used.
If you use the contact form, the data you enter (name, email, message) will be transmitted to Formspree for processing your request.
Legal basis: Art. 6 (1) lit. b GDPR.
Data may be transferred to a third country (USA).
Further information can be found in Formspree's privacy policy.
By submitting the form, you consent to the processing of your data according to this policy.

4. Data Retention
Data is stored only as long as necessary to process your request.

5. Your Rights
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
- Right of access (Art. 15)
- Rectification (Art. 16)
- Erasure (Art. 17)
- Restriction of processing (Art. 18)
- Objection (Art. 21)
- Data portability (Art. 20)
You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection authority.

6. SSL Encryption
This website uses SSL encryption for security. A secure connection can be recognized by the address starting with "https://".

auth.title: Restricted Access

Enter the password you received together with the website link via email.
After entering the password, you will be able to view my information and download my resume.
